name: Asuka-san wa Nabikanai
storyline:
The heroine is the student council president of a certain school.

Beautiful, attractive, intelligent, and excellent motor skills, as if the heaven has given her not just two, but five or six attributes. Truly the flower on a high peak and the number of men who had confessed and got rejected are innumerable.

As a commoner, I thought she was the kind of woman who was way out of my league......

"Hey, Asuma!"

"Yes?"

While walking along the corridor after school, the teacher called me, and when I was about to respond, I heard a woman's voice behind me. I turned around and saw the student council president who is also nicknamed "Ice Princess".

"No, the one that I called is "Asuma"."

"......!!!"

Her clear white cheeks turned red in an instant. It was the first time that I saw her face like that.

"E.. Excuse me!!"

Then I learned that her name is Shishidou Asuka, and it began with a notebook that I picked up at the time that made me get noticed by the student council president.
summary: Asuka-san wa Nabikanai is an upcoming visual novel developed by Azarashi Software about a student council president.
